page.t: The Supremacy Mark V is a new variant that can switch between ion and laser damage.
The X-70B also known as "Phantom" is a ship for special agents of the Sith Empire.
The Supremacy Mark III is a new variant that can use missiles.
The Terminus Mark III is a new variant that is more robust than its earlier variant.
Better version than the normal CS Gemon 4.
The L-s9.X lasercanon is an experimental version of the standard 9.3 version.
The L-s7.X lasercanon is an experimental version of the standard 7.2 version.
The GA-60X heavy lasercanon is an experimental version of the standard GA-60s version.
Better version of the RH2. Dual-barreled long range laser turret installed on starships and stations as anti-starfighter defence.
Better version of the D6. The D6X is a medium dual-barreled turbolaser manufactured by one of the Empire's nationalized corporations. Boasts a high damage output and long range for its size.

The XX-22 is a better version than the XX-20 or the XX-18. Manufactured by the Taim and Bak Corporation, the XX-22 is commonly found on Sith-class Star Destroyers. High damage output and decent range for its size.
Better version of the normal TaB shield generator. Frigate-scale shield generator manufactured by the Taim and Bak Corporation.

Starforge Energy comes from the Starforge, harvesting energy from the sun and convert it to their own energy type. It works similar to the old Starforge on Rakata Prime from Revan's Sith Empire but at a weaker rate and it doesn't consume the sun itself.

This system is far away from the galaxy's protected sectors. Thanks to this miners and traders disappear with alarming regularity here, though very few dare to get this far from the well-protected sectors.\nThe wreck field tells the story of numerous miners killed during pirate raids, after refusing to cooperate.\nBut there's something that even the pirates are afraid about. An unknown threat, which makes pirate raids less frequent in this sector, than in the past.
